summary: A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.
cast: Nia Vardalos|John Corbett|Michael Constantine|Lainie Kazan|Andrea Martin|Gia Carides|Joey Fatone|Elena Kampouris|Alex Wolff|Louis Mandylor|Bess Meisler|Bruce Gray|Fiona Reid|Ian Gomez|Jayne Eastwood|Rob Riggle|Mark Margolis|Rita Wilson|John Stamos|Jeanie Calleja|Michael Sofos|Stavroula Logothettis|Leonidas Castrounis|Peter Tharos|Harper Gunn|Hershel Blatt|Tannis Burnett|Kathryn Greenwood|Teresa Pavlinek|Aniela Kurylo|Sam Moses|Roger Wong|Alec Stockwell|Gerry Mendicino|Kathryn Haggis|Kolton Stewart|Theodore Paraskevopoulos|Ethan Pugiotto|Ashleigh Rains|Chrissy Paraskevopoulos|Maria Vacratsis|Julia Gartha|Jeff White|Constantine Vardalos|Lauren Saarimaki|Leandro Amorim-Downie|Robert Bellissimo|Lindsay Christopher|Ann Green|Maxillian Grimm|Nicholas Moreau|Konstantina Pirkas|Dave Reachill
title: Mi gran boda griega 2
